name: Special Focus: Core Level 3
description:
#### **Special Focus: Core Level 3**

This six week training plan is specifically designed to improve your core strength and pelvic stability, which is often neglected in endurance athletes. With three short focused sessions per week this is the perfect way to get in the extra time to concentrate on the three dimensional segment from shoulder to hip. You can add this as an off-season block or an extra bump to your regular season training. These workouts will target core muscles but will also include considerable demand for the smaller muscles of the upper body.

​

Level 3 is for the athlete who recently completed Level 2 or coming back from a one to

three month lay-off. This is also the level for those transitioning from the

gym to body weight workouts. As with any of the SYSTM strength plans, take your

time with each session and follow the proper progression to reap the strength benefits.

​

This plan may be applied in conjunction with other Special Focused strength plans or with one of the 12 week add-ons for extra core training. However, if you add concurrent strength plans please be mindful that you are getting adequate recovery between workouts.

​

The Special Focus stand alone plans follow a 2:1 progression and have three sessions per week on Monday, Wednesday and Friday.

​

Let's do this!
planDescription: This plan is designed to target core strength and hip mobility.

prospects.name: Core Focus 02
prospects.description:
_Looking to improve ALL of the muscles that make up your core? You’ve come to the right place. The Core Focus series builds up everything from your hip to your shoulders - front, back, and side._

​

In this session, we increase the coordination demands on your core by introducing more dynamic movements. This will challenge your ability to control unwanted movement and help you use your core to generate power throughout your body.

Recommended for those who have mastered Level 1 or who have a bit of experience with core strength training.

​

Unsure if this is the correct strength level for you?  [Click here for help.](https://wahoosystm.com/HelpCenterChooseStrengthLevel)

​

**Exercises Included:**

- Split Stance Side Bend w/ Arms Overhead
- Downward Dog
- Quadruped T-Spine Rotation
- Quadruped Pull In & Hold
- Quadruped Push Out & Hold
- Bird Dogs
- V ups
- Oblique Leg Lifts
- Marching Hip Bridge
- Pushup w/ Rotation
- Forward Bear Crawl
- Hip Hikes
- Sit Throughs
- Kneeling Hip Extension
- Single-Leg Hip Bridge
- Low Side Plank w/abduction and hold
- Back Extension w/ Opposite arm & leg raise
- High Side Plank w/ rotation
- Back Extension with Hold
- Child's Pose

​

prospects.name: Core & Hip Mobility A
prospects.description:
This module is a ground-based session designed to improve mobility through your hips and low back while activating and integrating muscles that are key to core stability. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Inchworm
- Pigeon Stretch
- Hip Bridge w/Knee Squeeze
- Marching Hip Bridge
- Back Extension w/Arms Overhead
- Quadruped w/Alt. Leg/Arm
- Bird Dog
- Kneeling Pelvic Tilt

prospects.name: Core Focus 03
prospects.description:
_Looking to improve ALL of the muscles that make up your core? You’ve come to the right place. The Core Focus series builds up everything from your hip to your shoulders - front, back, and side._

​

This session will increase the demand on your core with additional dynamic movements. We’ll also throw in some tempo exercises which require you to move slowly during the eccentric loading phase (i.e., the tough parts). These tempo movements enhance your ability to manage tension through your core so you can better react to external variables (weather, terrain, competitors) during activity.

​

Unsure if this is the correct strength level for you?  [Click here for help.](https://wahoosystm.com/HelpCenterChooseStrengthLevel)

​

**Exercises Included:**

- Split Stance Side Bend w/ Arms Overhead
- Quadruped T-Spine Rotation
- Quadruped Push Out & Hold
- Quadruped Pull In & Hold
- Bird Dogs
- Oblique Leg Lifts
- High Plank w/ Opposite arm & leg raise
- Single-Leg Hip Bridge w/ Rotation
- Pushup w/ Rotation
- Side to Side Bear Crawls
- Sit Throughs
- Kneeling Hip Extension
- V ups
- High Side Plank w/ rotation
- Single-Leg Hip Rotations
- Back Extension w/ opp arm & leg raise
- Back Extensions with Arms Overhead
- Tempo Push Up Wide
- High Side Plank w/ toe taps
- Pigeon Stretch

​

prospects.name: Core & Hip Mobility B
prospects.description:
This ground-based session is designed to improve mobility through your hips and low back while activating and integrating muscles that are key to core stability. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Pigeon Stretch
- Double Leg Hip Bridge
- Marching Hip Bridge
- Back Extension w/ Opp Arm & Leg Raise
- Bird Dog
- Single-Leg Hip Bridge
- Oblique Leg Lift w/Crossed Legs

prospects.name: Shoulder & Upper Back Mobility A
prospects.description:
This session is designed to improve motion through your shoulders and upper back as well as activate muscles that are key for upper body stability and posture. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality range of motion. Do not move into pain. If you have tingling or numbness from any of these movements stop and consult a medical professional. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Forward Shoulder Rolls
- Backward Shoulder Rolls
- Standing T-Spine Rotation
- Standing Scapular Retraction
- Wall Angels
- Scapular Depression
- Quadruped w/Alt. Arm Raise
- Quadruped w/Push Out
- Quadruped w/Pull In
- Downward Dog

prospects.name: Shoulder & Upper Back Mobility B
prospects.description:
This session is designed to improve motion through your shoulders and upper back as well as activate muscles that are key for upper body stability and posture. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality range of motion. Do not move into pain. If you have tingling or numbness from any of these movements stop and consult a medical professional. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Quadruped T-Spine Rotation
- Shoulder External Rotation
- Wall Angels
- Low Plank w/Scapular Press
- Quadruped w/Push Out
- Quadruped w/Pull In
- Downward Dog
- Side-Lying T-Spine Arcs

prospects.name: Core & Hip Mobility C
prospects.description:
This module is a standing-based session designed to improve mobility through your hips, and challenge balance while activating and integrating muscles that are key to core stability. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Split Stance Back Bend
- Single-Leg Hip Hinge
- Split Stance Side Bend w/Arms Overhead
- Single-Leg Hip Hinge w/Rotation
- Downward Dog
- Pigeon Stretch

prospects.name: Core & Hip Mobility B
prospects.description:
This ground-based session is designed to improve mobility through your hips and low back while activating and integrating muscles that are key to core stability. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Pigeon Stretch
- Double Leg Hip Bridge
- Marching Hip Bridge
- Back Extension w/ Opp Arm & Leg Raise
- Bird Dog
- Single-Leg Hip Bridge
- Oblique Leg Lift w/Crossed Legs

prospects.name: Neck Mobility A
prospects.description:
This standing-based session is designed to improve mobility and circulation through the cervical spine. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on performing them with control. Do not move into pain. If you have tingling or numbness from any of these movements stop and consult a medical professional. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Cervical Flexion w/Hold
- Cervical Side Bend
- Cervical Rotation
- Chin Tuck Reps
- Cervical Side Bend w/Hold
- Cervical Extension
- Cervical Retraction
- Cervical Retraction w/Hold

prospects.name: Shoulder & Upper Back Mobility A
prospects.description:
This session is designed to improve motion through your shoulders and upper back as well as activate muscles that are key for upper body stability and posture. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality range of motion. Do not move into pain. If you have tingling or numbness from any of these movements stop and consult a medical professional. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Forward Shoulder Rolls
- Backward Shoulder Rolls
- Standing T-Spine Rotation
- Standing Scapular Retraction
- Wall Angels
- Scapular Depression
- Quadruped w/Alt. Arm Raise
- Quadruped w/Push Out
- Quadruped w/Pull In
- Downward Dog

prospects.name: Core & Hip Mobility D
prospects.description:
This standing-based session integrates adduction (towards your body midline) and abduction (away from your body midline) moves to improve stability through your hips and challenge balance while activating and integrating muscles that are key to core stability. Take your time to work through the movements and focus on quality. Be sure to rotate through the other routines in this series on a regular basis for maximum benefit.

​

Exercises:

- Split Stance Back Bend
- Standing Hip Abduction
- Single-Leg Hip Hinge
- Single-Leg Hip Bridge w/Rotation
- Pigeon Stretch

prospects.name: Completed Level 3 Strength
prospects.description:
Congratulations on completing Level 3 Strength!  
  
We recommend starting on Level 4 for your next plan.
prospects.notes: Nice work. It's time to Level Up
